name: LikeBaitExterminator
description: Replaces like-baiting comments with text of your choice.

onlyOnDaily.name: Enable Only on Daily/Weekly
onlyOnDaily.description: Only toggles the mod on daily/weekly levels. Intended for the population that only finds this useful for daily/weekly chat.

markAsSpam.name: Mark As Spam
markAsSpam.description:
Marks likebaiting comments as spam.

<cy>Disclaimer: Sometimes the "Show" button does nothing.</c>

hideShowButton.name: Hide Show Button
hideShowButton.description:
Hides the "Show" button from <cy>all</c> comments marked as spam, including comments marked by this mod.

<cy>Formerly a standalone mod called "PoofShowButton".</c>

replacementText.name: Replacement Text
replacementText.description: Set your replacment text for likebating comments here.
replacementText.default: [LikeBaitExterminator] LBE has identified this comment to be likebait. No further action is necessary.

issues.info: Ping me <cl>(@erymanthus)</c> in the Geode SDK Discord server's <cl>#help</c> channel if you need help. <cr>DMs are NOT accepted.</c>
